extensionDescription.message: This extension allows you to initiate a Google search using any image on the web. By the Google Images team.

contextMenuTitle.description: The text of the item in context menu.

mouseOverOptionText1.description: The text of mouseover to show camera icon option. Display on options page before the icon.

mouseOverOptionText2.description: The text of mouseover to show camera icon option. Display on options page after the icon.

neverOptionText1.description: The text of never show camera icon option. Display on options page before the icon.

neverOptionText2.description: The text of never show camera icon option. Display on options page after the icon.

getURLOptionText.message: Search using the URL of an image (not recommended)
getURLOptionText.description: The text of the GET URL option. If this is set, whenever the user does a search, the image is fetched from one of Google's datacenters instead of the browser uploading it to Google.

hoverMinDimsOptionText1.description: The text for the hover minimum width and height option.

hoverMinDimsOptionText2.description: The text for the hover minimum width and height option.

iconDescriptionText.description: The icon description text after the icon. Display on options page.

privacyText.description: The text of privacy link. Display on options page.

optionsPageTitleText.description: The title of the options page.

saveButtonText.description: The text of the save button on options page.

resetButtonText.description: The text of the reset button on options page.

saveButtonFinishText.description: The text of the save button on options page when user performed a successful save operation.
